org.czeal.rfc3986.URIReferenceBuilder

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      URIReferenceBuilder URIReferenceBuilder.appendPathSegments​(String... segment)
      Appends a path segment.
      URIReferenceBuilder URIReferenceBuilder.appendQueryParam​(String key, String value)
      Appends a new query parameter to the resultant URI reference.
      static URIReferenceBuilder URIReferenceBuilder.fromURIReference​(String uriRef)
      Creates a URIReferenceBuilder instance with a given string representing a URI reference.
      static URIReferenceBuilder URIReferenceBuilder.fromURIReference​(URIReference uriRef)
      Creates a URIReferenceBuilder instance with a given string representing a URI reference.
      URIReferenceBuilder URIReferenceBuilder.removeQueryParam​(String key)
      Removes the query parameter(s) specified by a key.
      URIReferenceBuilder URIReferenceBuilder.replaceQueryParam​(String key, String value)
      Replaces the value(s) of the query parameter(s) specified by the key with a new value.
      URIReferenceBuilder URIReferenceBuilder.setAuthorityRequired​(boolean authorityRequired)
      Determines whether or not the authority is required in the resultant URI reference.
      URIReferenceBuilder URIReferenceBuilder.setCharset​(Charset charset)
      Sets the charset used in the resultant URI reference.
      URIReferenceBuilder URIReferenceBuilder.setFragment​(String fragment)
      Sets the fragment.
      URIReferenceBuilder URIReferenceBuilder.setHost​(String host)
      Sets the host.
      URIReferenceBuilder URIReferenceBuilder.setPath​(String path)
      Sets the path.
      URIReferenceBuilder URIReferenceBuilder.setPort​(int port)
      Sets the port.
      URIReferenceBuilder URIReferenceBuilder.setQuery​(String query)
      Sets the query.
      URIReferenceBuilder URIReferenceBuilder.setScheme​(String scheme)
      Sets the scheme.
      URIReferenceBuilder URIReferenceBuilder.setUserinfo​(String userinfo)
      Sets the userinfo.
      URIReferenceBuilder URIReferenceBuilder.uriRef​(URIReference uriRef)
      Sets information about a given URIReferenceBuilder instance.
